website_summaries.verdict: Smooth design with quick-release mechanism in an ultra-value pack. Easy installation and comfortable grip for adults.
pros: Ergonomic design makes it easy for adults to open doors, yet it’s tough for kids to open, even escape-artist toddlers
6-pack of covers and 4-pack of corner guards make it a value buy, especially if you’re childproofing a home
cons: Might open too easily with quick-release button
Occasional reports of breakage with everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They work great, are easy to install, and keep my toddler safe. They are also great at locking out uncaffeinated parents.
customer_reviews.author: gabbie

customer_reviews.title: work well, but don't fit short knobs
customer_reviews.text: these work well on all my doors except one. on that door, the knob is rather short and tapers in a lot toward the door side, plus it's a bit hard to turn. so i have to pull out on the plastic cover in order to get a good grip. that wouldn't be a big problem if the door opened inward, but it opens outward. so i have to pull-squeeze-push which is a bit tricky when i'm carrying a diaper bag and a squirming child. not sure how to get around that. maybe i'll try sticking some padding between the cover and the knob.....
customer_reviews.author: t james turner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Worst , fit so tight to the knob that my kid can open it easily without pressing grey buttons on the sides! Would never buy it again or recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Busymommie

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit all doorknobs
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit my larger diameter door knobs, 2.25”. Mostly my fault for not looking deeper into what they fit. I have no doubt they will work on smaller door knobs but they would just make it easier to open mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well, hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty easy to install, but difficult to remove (which is a good thing since the kids can’t take it off, but a bad thing because sometimes neither can the parents 😂). It also works really well for keeping the kids from being able to open the doors. The previous door knob covers we had tried didn’t work as well, made it hard for even adults to open the doors, and my 2-year-old could fairly easily remove them. These are much better!
customer_reviews.author: TexasMom2019

customer_reviews.title: Overall fine
customer_reviews.text: There are pros and cons with these doorknob protectors. Pros: they work very well, they’re impossible for our toddler to open, they’re extremely easy to install. Cons: both packs had one that didn’t work, they’re impossible to remove without breaking. Overall I feel they were fine for the price and they work well, so I’d probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: WeLoveOllie

customer_reviews.title: Don't really work on my doors
customer_reviews.text: My doors have flat round door knobs, and these door knob covers don't really work. My 2 yo was able to open the doors with these covers on half the time. I'm not sure if this is because these covers are not designed right or they only work on very specific knobs. In either case, beware when you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Had to return, won't work with oval, round knobs
customer_reviews.text: These don't work with the flattened round knobs shaped like a doughnut. They are simply too tight on the knob and actually make it easier to turn for a kid because they offer a better grip than the slippery surface of the door knob. Should work OK for other knob shapes, but not mine.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The cover just absolutely wouldn’t grip our knobs to work. They’re also impossible to take off without breaking them. So he we had to rig them to allow us to stick our fingers through the cover and twist the knobs. In a way, the Little’s can’t open the doors but the down side is that sometimes us adults can’t open the door either.
customer_reviews.author: Fngrmnky

customer_reviews.title: Great baby proofing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different baby proofing items and these ones work great. They were easy to install, my 2 year old can't open the door, but my husband and I still can! We had some that were hard for us to open the door, but these ones work great. I loved getting 6 pieces too, so I didn't have to buy multiple packs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I did not realize you'd need a size chart for doorknobs
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to start by saying, you could literally be a monkey and install these, it's so easy, but the entire point of these is to be larger than the actual knob so it spins when little hands touch them. My doorknobs are of average size, so it was a bit of a surprise when these fit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Cobi

customer_reviews.title: No good if you have elderly people as well as children in the house
customer_reviews.text: They are too hard for people with arthritis or other disabilities to open. If you don't have hands with reasonable strength, you can't open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Swango

customer_reviews.title: Might not fit right to all your door knobs.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok product. It works fine on some of my door knob and it doesn’t on the others, so pay attention to the door knobs you have.
customer_reviews.author: Alonarybka

customer_reviews.title: GREAT knob covers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely easy to install and open the doors using the grips. Far better than the previous set I owned which was hard to open the doors with. These however fit our door knobs much better and we can open the doors with a breeze. Will not ever purchase any other safety knobs again. This product is WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: Tiahna Green

customer_reviews.title: All the knob covers fit my knobs and clicked easily into place
customer_reviews.text: All the knob covers fit my knobs and clicked easily into place. I can still access the locks on the doors. The grabbing mechanism doesn't slip and turns the knobs without sliding around. 5 stars for easy installation, working as intended, value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to use, but they work!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't my favorite doorknob covers. The push buttons are harder to get a grip on the doorknob than others I've used. They work, sure. Sometimes just take me a couple tries to get into a room. But hey, they keep the toddler safe. :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Visser

customer_reviews.title: doorknob covers worked exactly like I needed them to
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the annual Christmas visit by grandchildren, and they were perfect. The bonus corner pieces looked like they would be useful for some situations, but I did not use them because they required adhesive pads that I was afraid would mess up my furniture. If one wanted them for long term use I imagine they would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fits much better than the regular ones at the store
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled to find covers that fit our standard size doorknobs, and the past few days have been VERY frustrating since our toddler has learned how to open doors and has been getting into absolutely everything! Well I decided to order these in hopes that they would fit, and they do!!! And so far they seem to work fantastic. I wish I could give them more than 5 stars. If any of you need slightly bigger child-safe doorknob covers, definitely give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, they work well.
customer_reviews.text: Just snap snap and they are installed. Little bit of a learning curve to open the doors if you have 64 year old arthritic fingers, but it is much better than learning the little guy fell in the toilet head first and drowned, or that he fell down the stairs to the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought the door knob covers that you find in most stores. The hard plastic shell with a couple holes to allow you to grip the door knob and hated them. This cover allows you to squeeze the two rubber dots on either side in order to grip the knob easily. The ONLY issue is that if your door knob is flatter or not as thick as some, you may have to push the cover in and then grip it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to open!
customer_reviews.text: Easy too install and easy to use with the grips to open the door which we thought would be great for the Grandmas since they have arthritis and had trouble with our previous version of door knob covers... however they are too easy to open. My two year old figured it out within 3 hours. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany White

customer_reviews.title: not for ball doorknobs
customer_reviews.text: Within a day our toddler was turning all of the handles. Due to being taller he could use both hands and push in the sides, thus turning the doorknobs. We have round doorknobs and these barely fit on them. I think ours must be bigger than usual nowadays, because they are 30 years old and huge compared to friends' knobs.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly satisfied with these child proof knob covers. My toddler can't get past them but unlike some other brands I've seen, they are not overly hard for adults to deal with either and can be opened easily with one hand. My wife is not the biggest fan of child proofing the house because of some of the inconveniences it can cause, but even she was happily surprised by how easy these were to use.
customer_reviews.author: The Swede

customer_reviews.title: Works most of the time
customer_reviews.text: These work well on various sizes of round door knobs but some in my home are larger so they are easier to open by my toddlers. The kids can apply pressure to the grips and subsequently turn knobs. On my door knob with a lock in center (see pic) it is a challenge for me to easily maneuver lock/unlock without some effort. I'd still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mauivince

customer_reviews.title: work really well
customer_reviews.text: We have had a few different brands and these are my favorite. They seem to fit over the knobs well and are still easy to grab and turn. We have had them on the doors for a little more than a month and I still really like them
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Buy the one with the holes
customer_reviews.text: These dont grip the door handle enough to allow you to turn it easily. We fought with them for about a month and bought new ones that have the holes cut out...they're much easier to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Blue's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done.. a little too well. I had to fight opening doors too much so I eventually just took them off. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: amh316

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made... prob why it's so cheap. We didn't like them, ended up not even using them. Bought a different brand that worked way better.
customer_reviews.author: xochitl

customer_reviews.title: Yuk
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst knob covers I have ever bought. Everyone had issues trying to get out except the almost 2 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome work well. Sometimes a little too well my 6yo can’t open the one on the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works for toddlers and adults
customer_reviews.text: These work as intended. My toddler can not open doors where these are installed. He did notice the small hole in the middle for turning locks and for a brief moment I thought he figured out how to get a grip on the door knob through that small hole. He eventually gave up so I have no complaints. They also keep guests and the elderly inside. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sayla

customer_reviews.title: They seriously do the job!
customer_reviews.text: They seriously do the job. My three year old was an escape artist however after installing these he was left unable to escape! In fact, they are so good that it’s hard for me or my boyfriend to get out the door. Well not hard but effort is required.
customer_reviews.author: Smackcity

customer_reviews.title: Best childproof tool
customer_reviews.text: We used them for all the doors in the house where we don't want our toddlers to enter for safety reasons. They worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Hoov

customer_reviews.title: Good product but one design flaw...
customer_reviews.text: It does work as described, and my child cannot open any doors with it on yet, but the hole is too small for my fingers to lock/unlock the door.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works on most of the round door knobs
customer_reviews.text: Its big enough so accommodates most round door knobs. Takes some getting used to but easy for daily use
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a couple weeks. They work great. Poor kids can’t escape the house unattended and or get into Office, Craftroom and Music Room!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Doing their Job!
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely working to keep our littles from turning the knobs! The baby had been able to turn the gas on before. Now she can't!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great to for keeping the kids safe! Much nicer than the ones purchased from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: CTB

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  good price
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made, good price, fast delivery. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: AL from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Door Knob Covers!!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing another similar product that did not work I did some digging and found these!! They are high quality and are super easy to install!! My 2 and 3 year old cannot use them, as they were able to with the last ones!!! These are worth every penny and are a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D.

customer_reviews.title: Works-dependent on door knob size.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on small door knobs. Basically useless on large doorknobs and makes it easier for kids to open.
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I like these because the pinch tabs make it even harder for my escape artists to open
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok. I am not a fan of these but I am also not a fan of chasing kids outside.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Shain

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wild child that figured out how to get most knob covers off... except this style! They work great for us.. stresses out our guests because most people can’t figure it out🤣 Just bought a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Hard to take off!
customer_reviews.text: Great door knob covers! Very easy to use! However they are EXTREMELY hard to take off!! And if it gets really steamy in the bathroom and there’s condensation on the door knob it won’t work! Me and my husband and my daughter were stuck in the bathroom for 10 minutes until we could finally open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has a habit of locking doors and flushing things down the toilet. These knob covers are preventing her from doing either.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: The Fit They Work
customer_reviews.text: Bought knobs at Fred Myers all too small couldn’t get over knobs and they’re standard knobs ! Ordered more thru Amazon they (of course) fit
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Russell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They're exactly as advertised. Now my baby hulk remains in safety.
customer_reviews.author: cannibal

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Work much better than other similar products. Easy to install and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Huby

customer_reviews.title: These are not soft, malable
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to turn the knob upon squeezing the it in the right place so it's easy for me, not easy for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The door knobs were easy to install. The only concern I had was with the corner covers, but I had them on a glass top table. One of the corner covers had difficulty staying on the corner. It would work better having a square corner without any glass.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Michael

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for small door handles
customer_reviews.text: We have an older duplex and I guess we have small door handles because these do not work at all. Once you get it on, you cannot twist the handle without frustration
customer_reviews.author: E. Giese

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of these at the price point
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these at the price point. Makes it a great deal. They’ve already saved my 2 year old from escaping out the front door on her own
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: A few months in and he still hasn't figured them out yet!
customer_reviews.text: A few months in and he still hasn't figured them out yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep the gets in(or out)
customer_reviews.text: These are a mist have for the 3 year old eacape artist.
customer_reviews.author: crdaniels

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works better than another brand I tried and didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great child proof door knobs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these child proof door knobs. They are so much easier to use than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: R. d.

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for most doorknobs
customer_reviews.text: These grips work fine on small doorknobs, but are too tight on others. For another item, this might be only a minor annoyance, but it renders these door knob covers useless (no need to press the buttons to turn the knob = no baby-proofing).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Work well. They fit a little loose on your standard bedroom doorknobs, but they don’t come off or anything. Overall, good choices especially since the kids can’t open any doors now lol.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would fit my door knobs because they’re older and short/extra round. They fit great though!!!! Most importantly, my toddler can’t open doors he’s not supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Dalis Perez

customer_reviews.title: Work really good
customer_reviews.text: They work really good, they have been on for 3 weeks and my 2 year old still can’t figure out how to open the doors we have tried 2 kinds before this and in a matter of days she had it figured out but she hasn’t figured these out yet
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old has figured out how to unlock doors. After a very nerve wracking escape, I found these. Now he gets very frustrated since he no longer can get out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, made for tiny people or small, strong hands
customer_reviews.text: Better have strong fingers, and tiny to get to your locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: samuel hemple

customer_reviews.title: Safe baby :)
customer_reviews.text: So glad i ordered these. My DD learned to open doors and these have prevented many trips to the Dr because she swallowed something she shouldn't have even been able to get too
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job as advertised! No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Installation is instant- just clip it on. Keeps the kid out and easy enough for all adults to use. Even grips our skinny knobs.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: They work, and they fit my door knobs.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased other door knob covers that did not fit the neck of my door knob. These ones however did. I’m happy so far. This little devil/angel of mine can’t open the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Work perfectly to keep our toddler from going into rooms he shouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: StellaBionda

customer_reviews.title: It works well actually it works to well. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well actually it works to well. I have a hard time opening the door with this on.
customer_reviews.author: Volcan

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 packages to do all the doors in my house. Just installed the door knob covers yesterday and so far they're great! The table corner covers also fit on great with double sided adhesive provided. Those were a nice bonus
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Faust

customer_reviews.title: The preferred product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (place on the door knob in seconds) and works better than other door knob covers.
customer_reviews.author: wmarin

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: doesnt keep my kids out of the rooms. makes it easier to grasp the door knob.
customer_reviews.author: hawk_head

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My kids haven't been able to figure these out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solution
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm to keep small children from opening doors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for safety
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and they work well. They don't feel cheap like others I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Courtemanche

customer_reviews.title: They don't work
customer_reviews.text: They don't prevent child from being able to open door.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy install and fit perfectly. Keeps my 2 year old from opening doors. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits great over door knobs and easy to install. I'll be buying more for the rest of my doors.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Foster

customer_reviews.title: Product as expected
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with this product and very easily to install.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Keep kids self.
customer_reviews.text: I like that kids can't open the doors and get out with out me knowing it.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Aderman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the quantity and price
customer_reviews.text: I love these I bought these because my toddler is a bit too mischievous and starting to get in places she isn’t supposed to. As soon as I got these I haven’t had many incidents such as baby powder in my entire bedroom lol
customer_reviews.author: Jess

product_meta.title: Door Knob Covers (6pc) & Corner Protectors (4pc) Mega Bundle by Max Strength Pro, Safety Locks & Guards Best for Childproofing Your Doors & Tables, Easy to Install, Get Protected Today!
product_meta.description:
Your search for the perfect Door Knob Covers is over!


Childproof your home today!

● Are you worried about the safety of your child?

● Do your fear sudden trapping of those precious little fingers in a door?

● Worried about your child opening unwanted doors?

Introducing the Max Strength Pro Door Knob Covers Set to Put Your Life at Ease!

● Max Strength Pro Door Knob Covers prevents your child from opening unwanted door.

● Locked doors ensure no trapping of hands or fingers in doors.

● 6 Door Knob covers allowing you to safeguard multiple doors and rooms.

● Bonus 4 table corner guards to keep your child safe from dangerous edges.

● Quick and easy installation. No tools required - no mess!

● White color which blends in easily with your house interior and decor.

Amazon Buyers Trust Our Max Strength Pro Brand to be Premium Quality Products.

We Cannot Guarantee this Special Pricing, So Be Sure to Click Buy Now!
feature_bullets: THE. ULTIMATE. PROTECTION: Our premium door knob guards will prevent your child from opening & closing doors and from locking themselves in the room. No more running around the house stopping your child every few minutes. Put your feet up and relax.

PREMIUM. BUNDLE: Each set contains 6 door knob safety covers giving you ample pieces to protect multiple rooms & doors and even keep few as a back up. Also included as Bonus are 4 safety corner guards protecting your child from sharp table corners and edges.

EASY. INSTALLATION: Simply snap on the handle and you are all set, no tools required. Prevent those tiny hands from fiddling with door knobs and from opening unwanted doors like the basement or worse the front door, yikes!

SAFE. COMPATIBLE: Works with 95% of door knobs, all common and standard styles. Completely safe to use around the house. Subdued and unobtrusive design, white colour, TPR material, perfectly blends with the style of your house.

UNBEATABLE GUARANTEE: We know you carry a lot on your shoulder and therefore we pay great attention in providing the best yet most affordable products for you. So much care and thought goes into our products that we are certain that you would love them. However if the product is not to your satisfaction simply contact us for a full refund, no questions asked!
